languages.text: "Я молюсь лишь о том, чтобы благословенная Инцендия не сочла тяжесть провинностей обитателей Футфола неизбывной и не очистила эту станцию в купели пламени. Хотя она вполне заслуживает этого".

"I only pray that the blessed Incendia does not find the burden of the offences of Footfall's denizens so indelible as to cleanse the station in a fiery fount. Even though it certainly deserves such a fate."
languages.original_text: "Я молюсь лишь о том, чтобы благословенная Инцендия не сочла тяжесть провинностей обитателей Футфола неизбывной и не очистила эту станцию в купели пламени. Хотя она вполне заслуживает этого".

"I only pray that the blessed Incendia does not find the burden of the offences of Footfall's denizens so indelible as to cleanse the station in a fiery fount. Even though it certainly deserves such a fate."

languages.text: “我只希望得到赐福的因森蒂娅不会认为落脚港居民的罪行过于严重，认为只能用炽热的烈火净化这个地方，尽管这个地方确实应当落得这样的下场。”
languages.original_text: "I only pray that the blessed Incendia does not find the burden of the offences of Footfall's denizens so indelible as to cleanse the station in a fiery fount. Even though it certainly deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: “我只希望得到赐福的因森蒂娅不会认为落脚港居民的罪行过于严重，认为只能用炽热的烈火净化这个地方，尽管这个地方确实应当落得这样的下场。”

languages.text: «Rezo para que la bendita Incendia no considere la carga de las transgresiones de los habitantes de Paso tan indelebles como para purificar la estación con fuego. Aunque cierto es que se merece tal destino».
languages.original_text: "I only pray that the blessed Incendia does not find the burden of the offences of Footfall's denizens so indelible as to cleanse the station in a fiery fount. Even though it certainly deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: «Rezo para que la bendita Incendia no considere la carga de las transgresiones de los habitantes de Paso tan indelebles como para purificar la estación con fuego. Aunque cierto es que se merece tal destino».

languages.text: 「祝福されしインセンディアが、フットフォールの住民たちの罪の重荷があまりに根深いと感じ、ステーションを燃える泉で浄化しようと思わないように祈るばかりです。例えこの場所がそのような運命に値するとしても」
languages.original_text: "I only pray that the blessed Incendia does not find the burden of the offences of Footfall's denizens so indelible as to cleanse the station in a fiery fount. Even though it certainly deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: 「祝福されしインセンディアが、フットフォールの住民たちの罪の重荷があまりに根深いと感じ、ステーションを燃える泉で浄化しようと思わないように祈るばかりです。例えこの場所がそのような運命に値するとしても」

languages.text: "Ich bete nur, dass die gesegnete Incendia die Bürde der Vergehen der Bewohner von Footfall nicht für so kolossal hält, dass sie gleich die gesamte Station mit einem reinigenden Feuer überzieht. Obwohl dieses Schicksal durchaus verdient wäre."
languages.original_text: "I only pray that the blessed Incendia does not find the burden of the offences of Footfall's denizens so indelible as to cleanse the station in a fiery fount. Even though it certainly deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bete nur, dass die gesegnete Incendia die Bürde der Vergehen der Bewohner von Footfall nicht für so kolossal hält, dass sie gleich die gesamte Station mit einem reinigenden Feuer überzieht. Obwohl dieses Schicksal durchaus verdient wäre."

languages.text: « J'espère simplement que la bienheureuse Incendia ne finira pas par jeter aux flammes Castel tout entière pour purifier les fautes de ses habitants... Même si ce sort serait mérité. »
languages.original_text: "I only pray that the blessed Incendia does not find the burden of the offences of Footfall's denizens so indelible as to cleanse the station in a fiery fount. Even though it certainly deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère simplement que la bienheureuse Incendia ne finira pas par jeter aux flammes Castel tout entière pour purifier les fautes de ses habitants... Même si ce sort serait mérité. »

languages.text: "Kutsanmış İncendia'nın Binliman'da yaşayanların günahlarını geri dönülemez bulup tüm hiddetiyle istasyonu arındırmaması için dua ediyorum. Böyle bir kaderi hak ediyor olsalar bile böyle düşünüyorum."
languages.original_text: "I only pray that the blessed Incendia does not find the burden of the offences of Footfall's denizens so indelible as to cleanse the station in a fiery fount. Even though it certainly deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsanmış İncendia'nın Binliman'da yaşayanların günahlarını geri dönülemez bulup, tüm hiddetiyle istasyonu arındırmaması için dua ediyorum. Her ne kadar böyle bir kaderi hak ediyor olsa da."
